title: Ye Yan
overview: Fang Xin Yan was saved by the domineering boss. She made a deal with Jiang Ji Chun and lurked around his nephew to obtain information for him in exchange for clues about her family's murder. During this period, she was moved by the Jiang Ming Langs's gentleness and got involved in the fight between uncle and nephew, and the boss was already in love. As the clues slowly surfaced, it turned out that the real murderer had been hiding around her for a long time.
